description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ace on Steroids sets you in the seat of Ace, a young pilot in charge of protecting Earth from incoming asteroids. While fully playable, the goal of Ace on Steroids is to serve as a purpose to learn how to make games using Microsoft Xna, the SynapseGaming SunBurn engine and the Indiefreaks Game Framework. Visit http://indiefreaks.com to learn more.
